EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Chatter Collaboration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1. Easy desktop access
Complete the full log in process from your desktop for your first log in. You will be prompted for your name, new password which you will then confirm, and a security question. Your account will then be created. To access Salesforce thereafter, add the link to Favourites/Bookmarks by copying the hyperlink and saving in Favourites/Bookmarks For queries - Comment and post queries to the Salesforce Help and Support group on Chatter
2. Mobile Ready
Refer to the attachment to download the Salesforce1 App for Android or IOS devices only
Colin Iles Head of Client Strategy
